techmeme.title: Filing: OnlyFans revenue rose 20% YoY to ~$1.31B for the FY ending November 2023; creator accounts grew 29% YoY to ~4.1M while fan accounts rose 28% YoY to 305M (Kaya Yurieff/The Information)
Changpeng Zhao may have been banned for life from managing or operating Binance, but has kept friendly ties and as its majority shareholder will have influence (Lucinda Shen/Axios)
YouTube takes down Tenet Media and four other channels after the US DOJ alleged that Russia was paying US right-wing political influencers to produce content (Gerrit De Vynck/Washington Post)
Telegram passes 10M paid subscribers and removes People Nearby, saying the feature was used by less than 0.1% of users and had "issues with bots and scammers" (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
Source: TSMC achieved production yields at its Arizona facility on par with established plants in Taiwan and plans to start mass production in Arizona in 2025 (Debby Wu/Bloomberg)
